channel.title: Blackberry on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Blackberry on Konigi

item.title: Android Interaction Design Patterns
item.description: Android Patterns is a community-contributed site with interaction patterns for Android app design. The site is created by the folks at Dutch interaction design firm, UNITiD, who also provide an mobile wireframe templates for Android and Blackberry devices. http://www.androidpatterns.com/wiki

item.title: PhoneGap | Cross platform mobile framework
item.description: PhoneGap is an open source development tool for building fast, easy mobile apps with JavaScript. If youâ€™re a web developer who wants to build mobile applications in HTML and JavaScript while still taking advantage of the core features in the iPhone, Android, Palm, Symbian and Blackberry SDKs, PhoneGap is for you. http://phonegap.com/
